Articles.Content:
Hello from Argentina to everybody, my first post here !!.

As a fan of space things this is the perfect game for my, now i can't imagine without KSP in my computer so i take this to thanks the developers for make the best game ever and the moders for make it even better !!!

Hello Nemeko, and welcome to the forum!

We have a very international community here and it is also a very helpful and interesting group of people.  Glad to have you aboard.

Happy landings!
Heh. KSP can be quite addicting. Glad you could join the forums, and looking forward to your creations.
